definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Sporadic gunfire from insurgents down the main road flies harmlessly overhead.
sentences.chinese: 暴亂分子零星的炮火聲在主街道上空迴盪。

sentences.english: Aerobatic flights over airfield up to 2000m.
sentences.chinese: 花樣飛行在機場上空，高度2000米。

sentences.english: The BEE hung poised above the flower.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂在花的上空定住了。

sentences.english: We'll be passing over Yellowknife and the 5 Great Lakes.
sentences.chinese: 本機將會通過黃刀鎮及五大湖區上空。

sentences.english: Fireworks light up the sky over a grain elevator in Bowlus, Minnesota.
sentences.chinese: 煙火照亮了明尼蘇達州玻魯斯的一間穀倉的上空。

sentences.english: Lightning rod array above the underground Kiva on South Baldy Peak.
sentences.chinese: 閃電上空南博爾迪山山頂地下Kiva棒陣列。

sentences.english: Just then, a whole flight of bombers zoomed over the house.
sentences.chinese: 就在這時，一整隊轟炸機從房子上空呼嘯而過。

sentences.english: Temporary restricted areas may also be established over other areas when needed.
sentences.chinese: 根據需要還可以在其他地區上空劃設臨時空中限制區。

sentences.english: Clouds over Manitoba, Canada, are bathed in green light from an August 4 aurora.
sentences.chinese: 8月4日加拿大馬尼巴託上空的雲朵沐浴在綠光之中。

sentences.english: The plane circled the airport before landing.
sentences.chinese: 飛機在着陸之前在機場上空盤旋。

sentences.english: He says warm air over the atlantic will cause increased hurricane activity.
sentences.chinese: 他說，大西洋上空的暖空氣是造成嚴重的颶風的原因。

sentences.english: Bright volumes of vapour through Lothbury glide.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的霧氣在羅伯利上空飄遊。

sentences.english: A cloud of suspicion still hung over the White House.
sentences.chinese: 白宮上空仍籠罩着一團疑雲。

sentences.english: Flights over Moscow are made only in the clockwise direction.
sentences.chinese: 在莫斯科上空飛行只能是沿着順時針方向。

sentences.english: In this respect, the arch across the top of the new stadium comes in handy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這一點，橫架在新球場上空的拱梁十分吸引眼球。

sentences.english: The aircraft circled around over the landing strip …
sentences.chinese: 飛機在着陸跑道上空兜圈子。

definition: to rise to the sky/to lift off/to levitate/liftoff
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
